p: Ferulin C, a natural sesquiterpene coumarin, is extracted from from Ferula ferulaeoides. In breast cancer cells, Ferulin C (20 Î¼M) substantially elevated the expression of Bax, and reduced the expression of Bcl-2. Ferulin C also caused the cleavage of caspase3, caspase7, caspase9, and PARP, which indicated the activation of the classical mitochondria apoptotic pathway ( 21).
